name: FIRST_VALUE
shortDescription: Get the first value in a group or window
description: Window function that returns the first value in an ordered partition.

parameters.name: column
parameters.description: Column to get first value from

examples.title: First value per group
examples.description: Get earliest value in each partition
examples.sql:
SELECT product, amount,
  FIRST_VALUE(amount) OVER (PARTITION BY product ORDER BY timestamp) as first_amount
FROM sales

notes: Typically used as a window function with OVER clause
Order determined by ORDER BY in window specification
